text:
When compiling apache with a custom location for zlib using for example --with-z=/opt/zlib it will instead use the system installed zlib even though it was specified to use /opt/zlib

ldd shows it not using the specified one.

libz.so.1 => /lib64/libz.so.1 (0x00000032b1c00000)
creator: eiji-gravion@hotmail.com
